languages.text: "Потому что козни Губительных сил бессильны против слуг Бога-Императора, ведомых светом Его".
"Because the schemes of the Ruinous Powers are powerless against the servants of the God-Emperor, who are guided by His light."
languages.original_text: "Потому что козни Губительных сил бессильны против слуг Бога-Императора, ведомых светом Его".

traits.locale_text: "Because the schemes of the Ruinous Powers are powerless against the servants of the God-Emperor, who are guided by His light."
"Because the schemes of the Ruinous Powers are powerless against the servants of the God-Emperor, who are guided by His light."
"Because the schemes of the Ruinous Powers are powerless against the servants of the God-Emperor, who are guided by His light."
"Because the schemes of the Ruinous Powers are powerless against the servants of the God-Emperor, who are guided by His light."

languages.text: "Weil die Intrigen der Mächte der Zerstörung gegen die Diener der Gottimperators machtlos sind, die von Seinem Licht geleitet werden."
languages.original_text: "Because the schemes of the Ruinous Powers are powerless against the servants of the God-Emperor, who are guided by His light."

traits.locale_text: "Weil die Intrigen der Mächte der Zerstörung gegen die Diener der Gottimperators machtlos sind, die von Seinem Licht geleitet werden."

languages.text: “因为神皇的仆人追随着祂的明光，毁灭之力的阴谋无法伤害他们。”
languages.original_text: "Because the schemes of the Ruinous Powers are powerless against the servants of the God-Emperor, who are guided by His light."

traits.locale_text: “因为神皇的仆人追随着祂的明光，毁灭之力的阴谋无法伤害他们。”

languages.text: « Parce que les petites manigances des Puissances de la Ruine ne peuvent atteindre les serviteurs de l'Empereur-Dieu, qui sont guidés par Sa lumière. »
languages.original_text: "Because the schemes of the Ruinous Powers are powerless against the servants of the God-Emperor, who are guided by His light."

traits.locale_text: « Parce que les petites manigances des Puissances de la Ruine ne peuvent atteindre les serviteurs de l'Empereur-Dieu, qui sont guidés par Sa lumière. »

languages.text: «Porque las conjuras de los Poderes Ruinosos son impotentes contra los sirvientes del Dios Emperador, guiados por su luz».
languages.original_text: "Because the schemes of the Ruinous Powers are powerless against the servants of the God-Emperor, who are guided by His light."

traits.locale_text: «Porque las conjuras de los Poderes Ruinosos son impotentes contra los sirvientes del Dios Emperador, guiados por su luz».

languages.text: 「禍つ神々の陰謀は、神帝陛下の光に導かれししもべには無力だからだ」
languages.original_text: "Because the schemes of the Ruinous Powers are powerless against the servants of the God-Emperor, who are guided by His light."

traits.locale_text: 「禍つ神々の陰謀は、神帝陛下の光に導かれししもべには無力だからだ」

languages.text: "Çünkü Yıkıcı Güçler'in planları; Tanrı İmparator'un, ışığını kılavuz edinmiş hizmetkârları karşısında âciz kalır."
languages.original_text: "Because the schemes of the Ruinous Powers are powerless against the servants of the God-Emperor, who are guided by His light."

traits.locale_text: "Çünkü Yıkıcı Güçler'in planları; Tanrı İmparator'un, ışığını kılavuz edinmiş hizmetkârları karşısında âciz kalır."
